QuestData.Title: Off-the-Books Brawlin'
QuestData.Description:
Gazlowe hired you for protection too? I guess it's true that he only hires the best, eh? Ha!
Pay's great, but the rules are dung: no fightin' in town, no exceptions. Bah!
<Usha takes a big gulp of her drink.>
That tiny tender prince won't give us his tech unless he thinks we're good little angels... Ha!
But Gazlowe didn't say nothin' about fightin' outside of town.
I got my own squad on the outskirts, ready to brawl with Grumbol's guzzlers if they show their bearded faces.
You want in?
QuestData.LogDescription: Brawl with Grumbol Grimhammer's forces on Mechagon.
